title: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not retain the filter information after it is set and the dialog is closed. This causes inconvenience and extra effort for users who need to apply the same filters repeatedly.
OB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not retain the filter information.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should persist the filter information after it is set and the dialog is closed.
SR:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Set the desired filter criteria.
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
5. Verify that the filter information is still retained.
